FuncDef: This command configures BGP to advertise routes that match a policy entry (or that match no other policy entry and, therefore, to which the default action applies) using a local address of the BGP instance as the BGP next-hop address. The command applies to IPv4, IPv6, label-IPv4, and label-IPv6 routes. It also applies to VPN-IPv4 and VPN-IPv6 routes, but only when used in conjunction with theenable-rr-vpn-forwardingcommand.
